item.title: Windows 10 KVM Single-GPU Passthrough
item.description: Note: This is here as notes and shouldn’t be taken as a direct guide. Table of Contents Host Specs Final VM Configuration Extra Kernal Arguements Nvidia GPU VFIO patch (This is required on 10XX Series) VM Networking CPU Settings Sata Passthrough Virt-Manager Hardware Overview Host Specs CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Motherboard: MSI B450 Tomahawk Max OS: Garuda Linux: Spotted-Eagle Kernel: 5.
